summary: A CVSS 9.1 severity vulnerability in the transitive dependency remove_dir_all-0.5.3 affects temporal-client-0.1.0, enabling arbitrary path deletion through TOCTOU race conditions. The issue was resolved by upgrading the dependency to remove_dir_all-0.8.0.
userImpact: Users of temporal-client-0.1.0 are exposed to a critical vulnerability allowing attackers to delete arbitrary files on their systems.
rootCause: TOCTOU (Time-of-Check-Time-of-Use) race condition in remove_dir_all crate enabling symlink substitution after path type checking.
resolutionDetails: Dependency remove_dir_all was upgraded from 0.5.3 to 0.8.0, which fixes the TOCTOU vulnerability.
keyQuote: TOCTOU race conditions, with the ability to cause arbitrary paths to be deleted by substituting a symlink for a path after the type of the path was checked.
